Articles.Content:
I love your art style, and it reminds me of Notch's old, now shelved project 0x10c. The majority of the project's following was very disappointed when 0x10c was cancelled, and an open sourced game is being started, code named Trillek. I would love to see you work on art, or at least concept for the game.

http://forum.trillek.org/

Really nice work. Especially texturing. And this is great because it mainly determine if a models look nice or not.

I think we have a new BAC9 here

Edited August 23, 2013 by KospY

I love your art style, and it reminds me of Notch's old, now shelved project 0x10c. The majority of the project's following was very disappointed when 0x10c was cancelled, and an open sourced game is being started, code named Trillek. I would love to see you work on art, or at least concept for the game.

http://forum.trillek.org/

0x10c is SHELVED??!?
Just saw this cool Renewable Bio-Fuel Modules mod on the spaceport, Uses your greenhouse module and sounds pretty useful!! Just goes to show the usefulness of your parts!!!!
why is it that no matter how hard i try that whenever i try to download all of your stuff zzz is that only the hubs actually appear in my parts menu?

These parts are incredible, ZZZ. You have an amazing sense of design. You may have edged out Bac9 in that regard (in my mind)

Ugh, now I need to learn how to animate things in KSP. Those engine mounts are just begging for animated vents and vectoring slats.

Ugh, now I need to learn how to animate things in KSP. Those engine mounts are just begging for animated vents and vectoring slats.

If it might help, you can check the source code for my airships (for animation) and SQUID (for emissions).

Yours parts are amazing ! Nice work

I came first for the greenhouse, then saw the hub !! Insane.

Yesterday, I downloaded the crosswalk from your signature in the first post, just have to make some minor changes in cfg to get it working. They are great.

Is there a specific post about the crosswalk, just to get more info about the different parts.

Here's 2 screen of your work in my station and in my future mun base

EDIT : Finally found the post for the crosswalk, looks like my changes aren't enough, connection points are not well set I think

Edited August 28, 2013 by Lasta
Yay new stuff. Gonna have to give it a go this weekend. New job eating all time i have.

I've been toying with the crosswalks a bit, and they're cool, but kind of confusing. How are all the parts supposed to fit together? E.g. what is the right way to orient the docking adapter, and what is the bridge for?

I've been toying with the crosswalks a bit, and they're cool, but kind of confusing. How are all the parts supposed to fit together? E.g. what is the right way to orient the docking adapter, and what is the bridge for?

There was thread about it, this is picture from it. Yes all this can be tricky. For adapter(it's dockport for clamp-a-tron ) "horns" must be in the direction of docking and on top. "Bridge" (oh, my spelling) is just even shorter then others and "welded" with radial attach, no other difference.
Your parts are awesome. Keep up the good work.
Love it. All of it.
These parts are incredible. Thank you so much for adding radiators, something KSP was seriously lacking.

Ooooh those radiators are SEXY.

They radiate awesomeness! (pun intended)

Oh, someone bumped this.

Thank you so much for adding radiators, something KSP was seriously lacking.

It was a request at " mod request sub-forum", I repost it here too to "keep in one place" and because it's as much useless as other things here.

Edited September 13, 2013 by zzz
what does it look like in game?
I love the new radiators, and especially the science lab. Also, I just watched Silent Running again last night and I love how your domes remind me of the ones on Valley Forge.

That science lab! Mother of God!

Edit to add: It's awesome, but the dry mass seems a bit light at .015. guessing it should be closer to the hitchhiker in mass? Maybe 2.5 or 3?

Edited September 13, 2013 by sojourner

what does it look like in game?

Not ingame screenshots is from the unity, so it very much like ingame too.

Edit to add: It's awesome, but the dry mass seems a bit light at .015. guessing it should be closer to the hitchhiker in mass? Maybe 2.5 or 3?

As I remember it was full hitchhiker copy in cfg but maybe I mess something afterward. I will check and reupload if needed.

Edited September 13, 2013 by zzz

Hi I have I have a question, I love your new radiators, and I want to be able to use them as solar panels as well. I have the part file edited so it functions as one, but the model tracks the sun along its edge instead of its face. Is there a way to change this, or is it built in be design?
Radiators are the opposite of solar panels, they want to present as little surface as possible to the sun in order to avoid absorbing heat.

Actually- is there a way for this to be set up as a shadow-generator?

(The less light falls on it, the more power it generates, as it would use thermocoupling to extract the power)
I understand what they are and their intended purpose, but I like how they look and still want to use them as such

I understand what they are and their intended purpose, but I like how they look and still want to use them as such

You can't change it from your side, and yes, it's by design and requested bahavor. I can to edit a setup of it in the Unity if needed and make special version for you, even with "solar panel" texture if needed, but not now

But wait, for test try to change "suncatcher" to "panel1" or "panel2" if I remember names correctly, it can works.

And I think the Lab is now fixed.

Edited September 13, 2013 by zzz
